text: mariyu vastavaniki, memu prati samajam vari vaddaku oka pravaktanu pampamu. (Atanannadu): "Miru allah nu matrame aradhincandi. Mariyu mithyadaivala (tagut la) aradhananu tyajincandi." Varilo kondariki allah sanmargam cupadu. Marikondari koraku margabhrastatvam niscitamai poyindi. Kavuna miru bhumilo sancaram cesi cudandi, a satyatiraskarula gati emayindo
